v.
CLEAN COAL TECHNOLOGIES, INC., a Nevada Corporation, Douglas Hague, and David Douglas, as Independent Executor of the Estate of C.J. Douglas, Appellees. No. 4D17-2751 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [July 12, 2018]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION
